ch0089_40_n/0101_0701_01_10:
Hey there, [Name:PlayerNickname ]. Where are
you headed off to today?
ch0089_40_n/0101_0701_02_10:
I’m very interested in where your adventure will
take you. If you don’t mind, please let me
join you.
ch0089_40_n/7101_0701_01_10:
Being with Reshiram on such a beautiful day
makes me so happy.
ch0089_40_n/7101_0701_02_10:
Reshiram’s a dear friend. It comforted me when
I was going through a rough time.
ch0089_40_n/7101_0701_03_10:
You should take good care of all your friends who
stay with you.
ch0089_40_n/7102_0701_01_10:
It’s important to treasure the memories you have
with your friends.
ch0089_40_n/7102_0701_02_10:
When the going gets tough, and you’re on the
verge of giving up...
ch0089_40_n/7102_0701_03_10:
those memories of your friends are what will get
you through it.
ch0089_40_n/7103_0701_01_10: You and your friend are connected in your hearts.
ch0089_40_n/7103_0701_02_10:
That’s exactly the kind of connection that I find to
be ideal.
ch0089_40_n/7103_0701_03_10:
The two of you have come to understand each
other so well.
ch0089_40_n/7103_0701_04_10: I hope more sync pairs can be like you.
ch0089_40_n/7104_0701_01_10: I’d like you to help us in our quest to find love.
ch0089_40_n/7104_0701_02_10:
Why am I asking you? Well, because my friend
seems to trust you.
ch0089_40_n/7104_0701_03_10: And of course, I do, too.
ch0089_40_n/7105_0701_01_10:
Can you hear that, [Name:PlayerNickname ]?
The voice of your friend...
ch0089_40_n/7105_0701_02_10:
Your friend is telling me that it’s so happy to have
been by your side all this time.
ch0089_40_n/7105_0701_03_10: And they’d like to stay with you forever.
ch0089_40_n/7105_0701_04_10:
I’m curious about your future together. Perhaps if
I join you, I could see that firsthand.
ch0089_40_n/1701_0701_01_10:
Here’s a special present for you in celebration of
this wondrous day.
ch0089_40_n/1701_0702_01_10: I hope it comes in handy.
ch0089_40_n/2501_0701_01_10: My first encounter with Reshiram felt like destiny.
ch0089_40_n/2501_0701_02_10:
And I also felt something special when I first met
you and your partner... Something that set you
apart from other sync pairs.
ch0089_40_n/2501_0701_03_10:
Meeting you and Reshiram are both important
memories that I’ll never forget.
ch0089_40_n/2501_0702_01_10:
Sometimes when you meet someone, you just
instinctively know that you’re going to get along
with them.
ch0089_40_n/2501_0702_02_10: That first impression is usually quite accurate.
ch0089_40_n/2501_0702_03_10: Perhaps destiny relies more on feelings than logic.
ch0089_40_n/2511_0701_01_10:
[Name:PlayerNickname ], is there anyone that
you consider special?
ch0089_40_n/2511_0701_02_10:
Like a family member, a friend, a sweetheart, or
even a rival...
ch0089_40_n/2511_0701_03_10: I have many precious friends...and family as well.
ch0089_40_n/2511_0702_01_10:
If you feel love for those close to you, be sure to
tell them so they know.
ch0089_40_n/2511_0702_02_10: I don’t want you to make the same mistakes I did.
ch0089_40_n/3001_0701_01_10:
Morning. This beautiful sunrise befits such a
special day.
ch0089_40_n/3003_0701_01_10:
It’s the small, lasting moments, like talking to your
friends, that are the most special.
ch0089_40_n/3005_0701_01_10:
Good evening. If you listen closely, you might be
able to hear harmonies that only ring out at night.
